channel.title: [pi] made a new option for pickpocket few glitches

item.title: [pi] made a new option for pickpocket few glitches
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

i made this under attack but it has a few glitches here is my base:

in player save i aded

} else if (token.equals("lastpick")) { p.lastpick = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("lastpick = ", 0, 11); characterfile.write(Long.toString(p.lastpick), 0, Long.toString(p.lastpick).length());

it wont let player login if they logout

in player.java i added lastpick to where SpecDelay is and FoodDely

i than added lastpick.java which just give item randomly to persom takes out of other persons invy

heres method for inwild

else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199); } getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); getPA().showOption(2, 0, "Pick Pocket", 1);

and in packhandler i got the right packet and set that up right

all my bugs i need help with:

  1. it wont let person back in after you use it and logout it says lastpick = 12312312321312 in char save

  2. it doesnt go away after exiting wild

thanks in advance

Read full topic
